title: OPL Week 6 Game of the Week: Chiefs vs Legacy
body:
As we approach the end of Split 2 of the OPL, two teams stand tall above their competition: Chiefs eSports Club and Legacy.

These teams have a lot of history from the 2014 Season and while the Chiefs have spent 2015 dominating, Legacy struggled at the start of Split 1 but have regained composure and their number two spot this Split. After some roster changes  the squad has been re-invigorated and playing in the same form that won them their first major in mid 2014, in a thrilling best of five against none other than their opponents for today!

Legacy have maintained a winning record against the Chiefs in longer sets, but may struggle in a single regular season game.

Momentum is key as we move into playoffs and while both teams are guaranteed to make it, securing points and perhaps a mental edge is still worth plenty late in the season.

So what do you think of the matchup? We'd love to hear your thoughts! Whether you want to discuss your favourite players or matchups, or simply learn more about the teams let us know below!

Is Slaydere going to continue his killstreak? Can ChuzChuz best Swiffer? Who has the best posture? Whatever you're thinking, sound off!

replies.body: I really want to see Minkywhale go big.{{champion:79}}
